name: The Longest Night (Orange Belt Hamster)
description:
THE LONGEST NIGHT

The gameplay is easy to figure out and there's tips that displays in the pause screen (press ENTER).

You'll need no more that a pair of minutes (or less) to finish the game.

Although I consider this a finished mini game, it conveys my main ideas to develop them further♥.

Myself - Designer / Programmer / Composer / Artist.
